2020 DraftKings League

DraftKings invite confusion

geru | 02 Sep 2019

I’m sorry for the barrage of invites that have gone out over the past few days. Use the Submit lineup link in the nav menu to make sure you’re submitting to the correct contest. If you’ve submitted to another contest, please withdraw your entry so that those contests will stop automatically re-running each week. Here’s how:

Open DraftKings app, select Upcoming, select the contest
Select your entry
Select the menu (⋮)
Select Withdraw Entry
Select Withdraw Entry again to confirm

Also, thank you to everyone who has submitted their membership fee. I will be reaching out to those who have not. If you have any questions about the DraftKings contests or anything else in this league, please contact me.
